title: All Ball - Bad Dwight Howard/Lakers Vibes; Ty Lue Laker Regrets; Guest: UC Irvine HC Russell Turner On Building An NCAA Tourney Giant Killer
itunes:title: All Ball - Bad Dwight Howard/Lakers Vibes; Ty Lue Laker Regrets; Guest: UC Irvine HC Russell Turner On Building An NCAA Tourney Giant Killer
description:
This week, Gottlieb looks at the odd fit if Dwight Howard signs with the Lakers, why Ty Lue must have some regrets on passing on the Lakers head coach now that he's coming on board with the Clippers as an Asst. on the Clippers, and talks with UC Irvine Head Coach Russell Turner about jhis basketball journey from D III star, to coaching with Don Nelson during Steph Curry's rookie year, his decision to take the UC Irvine job, and their upset win over Kansas State as a 13 seed in this year's tournament. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
